XXnagcitpu:1: prathamaḥ parivarttaḥ brahmāṇaṃ ca mahādevaṃ nārāyaṇaṃ sarasvatīm /
XXnagcitpu:2: varadāṃ ca mayā natvā kriyate jayamaṃgalam // NCit_1.1 //
XXnagcitpu:4: pārvatyā anusṛtyaiva jāyatāṃ kila paṇḍitāḥ // NCit_1.2 //
XXnagcitpu:8: namo namo mayā samyag ucyate citralakṣaṇam // NCit_1.3 //
XXnagcitpu:9: ādau candramasaṃ vande haraṃ ca candraśekharaṃ /
XXnagcitpu:10: viṣṇvindrau sūryamagniṃ ca varuṇaṃ marutaṃ tathā // NCit_1.4 //
XXnagcitpu:12: nagnajitaṃ namaskṛtya tvācāryāṃśca punaḥ punaḥ // NCit_1.5 //
XXnagcitpu:18: ucyate citralakṣaṇaṃ śṛṇvantu tadvidā janāḥ // NCit_1.8 //
XXnagcitpu:25: akālamṛtyuhīnāstāḥ kutaḥ krodhāḥ kuto malāḥ // NCit_1.11 //
XXnagcitpu:28: varṇāśramā hi catvāro na cyutā dharmatatparāḥ /
XXnagcitpu:31: bhayajito manaḥ śuddhaṃ pravṛttaṃ tapasi drutam // NCit_1.14 //
XXnagcitpu:41: kathaṃ rodiṣi bho vipra cetyapṛcchad dvijaṃ nṛpaḥ // NCit_1.19 //
XXnagcitpu:44: tato 'dharmeṇa rājyaṃ taṃ śāssīdaṃ nṛpa niścitam /
XXnagcitpu:45: viṣmayo ya itaḥ pūrvaṃ na jāto 'sau pravartate // NCit_1.21 //
XXnagcitpu:48: bramha priyau hi rājan tvaṃ sarva jānāsi bhūtale /
XXnagcitpu:49: prāṇatulyaṃ sutaṃ mahyaṃ dehi svāmin kṛpānvitaḥ // NCit_1.23 //
XXnagcitpu:50: dayāṃ yadi na kuryāstvaṃ śaktiman guṇavan nṛpa /
XXnagcitpu:53: ākarṣaṇe sutaṃ tasya matiṃ cakre nṛpālakaḥ // NCit_1.25 //
XXnagcitpu:55: sūryavarcodharaṃ yamam uditaṃ tatra dṛṣṭavān // NCit_1.26 //
XXnagcitpu:59: cākāle 'pahṛto yo 'sau tava dūtena durdhiyā // NCit_1.28 //
XXnagcitpu:61: viśvakarman dvijanmane asmai prītyā ca dhīmate // NCit_1.29 //
XXnagcitpu:62: śrutvā pretādhipo vākyaṃ pūjanīyaṃ hasan nṛpam /
XXnagcitpu:63: dadau pratyuttaraṃ mṛdu tejasā pūritaṃ vacaḥ // NCit_1.30 //
XXnagcitpu:65: kasyāpyākarṣaṇe tyāge svecchāśaktiḥ kuto mama // NCit_1.31 //
XXnagcitpu:66: sukhaṃ vā yadi vā duḥkhaṃ sarvaṃ karmavaśaṃ sadā /
XXnagcitpu:67: tasmāt rājan vijānīyān mayā naiva pragṛhyate // NCit_1.32 //
XXnagcitpu:71: karmānusāriṇī bhūmir vijñeyā ca sadā nṛṇām // NCit_1.34 //
XXnagcitpu:74: na śakyate na śakyate yama āha punaḥ punaḥ /
XXnagcitpu:75: dehi dehi sutaṃ deva rājñāpi prārthitaḥ punaḥ // NCit_1.36 //
XXnagcitpu:77: vyākulau tī mahāyuddhe tadā liptau babhūvatuḥ // NCit_1.37 //
XXnagcitpu:78: tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti ta rājā bahuśaḥ prāha vīrahā /
XXnagcitpu:79: sthito 'smīti raṇe rājan tamavocad nṛpaṃ yamaḥ // NCit_1.38 //
XXnagcitpu:81: akarod bhayajid rājā yamasyopari sarvataḥ // NCit_1.39 //
XXnagcitpu:83: apratirodharupaṃ tad astraṃ vavarṣa dharmarāṭ // NCit_1.40 //
XXnagcitpu:87: bhūpena sarvathā naṣṭā bhayapravartakā ime // NCit_1.42 //
XXnagcitpu:90: tataḥ pretādhipo devo dṛṣṭvā taṃ tu parājitam /
XXnagcitpu:95: babhūvurāturā sarve tena durlakṣaṇena vai // NCit_1.46 //
XXnagcitpu:96: duḥkhitāṃ sakalāṃ pṛthvīṃ dṛsṭvā brahmā tathā suraiḥ /
XXnagcitpu:97: ājagāma svayaṃ tatra tasmin deśe raṇākule // NCit_1.47 //
XXnagcitpu:99: sāñjaliḥ pūjayitvā taṃ prāha yathāyathaṃ vacaḥ // NCit_1.48 //
XXnagcitpu:102: pratyāvṛtya raṇād devaḥ kathayāmāsa tau tadā // NCit_1.49 //
XXnagcitpu:104: satyanarādhipasyaiva kālasya na tu karmaṇaḥ // NCit_1.50 //
XXnagcitpu:105: purā śubhāśubhaṃ karma tathā ca śiśunā kṛtam /
XXnagcitpu:106: labdhañca maraṇaṃ śīghra janma prāpya ca mānuṣam // NCit_1.51 //
XXnagcitpu:110: rupamālikha bho rājan sarvalokahitāya vaṃ // NCit_1.53 //
XXnagcitpu:119: yamadutā jitāḥ śaktyā sādhu sādhu kṛtaṃ tvayā // NCit_1.57 //
XXnagcitpu:120: brahmāṇā kathite tvevaṃ sa rājā harṣamāptavām /
XXnagcitpu:121: sarvadamanakārī tu daurmanasyaṃ yamo gataḥ // NCit_1.58 //
XXnagcitpu:123: brahmā svayaṃ samāśvāsya bhūpatiṃ prāha sattamaḥ // NCit_1.59 //
XXnagcitpu:124: dharmanītiḥ suvijñāya na nindet kāmapi prajām /
XXnagcitpu:126: yatra sevā satāṃ nāsti tatra nindā bhaved dhruvam /
XXnagcitpu:127: nālpamapi sukhaṃ kiñcid āpnoti nindukaḥ sadā // NCit_1.61 //
XXnagcitpu:131: jātyā balena dānena naipuṇyena ca vidyayā // NCit_1.63 //
XXnagcitpu:133: prakartavyo na kartavyo nindopāyaḥ kathañcana // NCit_1.64 //
XXnagcitpu:135: kṣamāvalambanīyā syāt nindā tyājyā tathaiva ca /
XXnagcitpu:136: sarvajño nirahaṃkaro guṇine na dviṣennṛpaḥ // NCit_1.65 //
XXnagcitpu:137: puruṣaṃ vacanaṃ tyājyam āghātaṃ visṛjet sadā /
XXnagcitpu:138: pratyakṣaṃ prāpyate yattu sārthakyaṃ tasya cintayet // NCit_1.66 //
XXnagcitpu:140: vidhiyaṃ naiva kāryaṃ hi yamasyāpi tato nṛpa // NCit_1.67 //
XXnagcitpu:141: brahmaṇetthaṃ sa bhūpālo hy upadiṣṭo dvijapriyaḥ /
XXnagcitpu:142: namaskṛtya yamasvārthe kṛtavān supriyaṃ tathā // NCit_1.68 //
XXnagcitpu:145: atha brahmā nṛpaṃ prāha nagnaṃ pretaṃ nivāraya /
XXnagcitpu:146: yamadāsaiḥ sadā viśvaṃ na pātayed bhavān khalu // NCit_1.70 //
XXnagcitpu:147: balena tejasā cāpi tapasemaṃ guṇaṃ nṛpāḥ /
XXnagcitpu:149: bhavān mahāyaśasvī ca karaṇīyo mayā kṣitau /
XXnagcitpu:150: nivartasva kumārgebhyas tvaṃ sadā pṛthivīpate // NCit_1.72 //
XXnagcitpu:153: prajāpatitulaḥ pṛthvāṃ yaśasvī tvaṃ bhaviṣyasi // NCit_1.74 //
XXnagcitpu:155: prajāḥ pālaya niṣpāpaḥ anumatistathā mama // NCit_1.75 //
XXnagcitpu:159: adya prabhṛti taccitra jagadvandyaṃ bhavet sadā // NCit_1.77 //
XXnagcitpu:163: citramiti prasiddhaṃ tat sarvatraiva bhaviṣyati // NCit_1.79 //
XXnagcitpu:165: sarve nemuśca bhaktyā taṃ brahmāṇaṃ lokapālakam // NCit_1.80 //
XXnagcitpu:167: sarvadevagaṇaiḥ sārdhaṃ jagāma svagṛhaṃ mudā // NCit_1.81 //
XXnagcitpu:169: svasthānamāgato dhīmān prīṇayitvā yamaṃ tathā // NCit_1.82 //
XXnagcitpu:171: yasmād deśāt samāpannas tatraiva praviveśa ca // NCit_1.83 //
XXnagcitpu:173: udyato 'bhūt sadaivāsau saputre prasthite dvije // NCit_1.84 //
XXnagcitpu:174: sarvarūpānukūlaṃ tat mānaṃ vā kīdṛśaṃ bhavet /
XXnagcitpu:175: tat praṣṭuṃ sṛṣṭikattariṃ brahmalokaṃ jagāma saḥ // NCit_1.85 //
XXnagcitpu:177: citrasya lakṣaṇāni me nānāvidhāni santi ca // NCit_1.86 //
XXnagcitpu:178: parimāṇaṃ kimasya syāt vidhinā kīdṛśena vā /
XXnagcitpu:180: brahmātha prāha bhūpendraṃ śṛṇu rājan samāhitaḥ /
XXnagcitpu:181: atiguhyaṃ mahad vākyaṃ paramaṃ kathayāmi te // NCit_1.88 //
XXnagcitpu:183: tataḥ prajā mayā sṛṣṭā upadiṣṭāśca tā mayā // NCit_1.89 //
XXnagcitpu:185: vedāccitraṃ prajātaṃ vai tasmād jñeyaṃ tathaiva tat // NCit_1.90 //
XXnagcitpu:190: yathā nareṣu bhūpendras tathā citraṃ kalāsu vai // NCit_1.92 //
XXnagcitpu:193: tathaiva citrakarmaṇi kalāḥ sarvāḥ samāśritāḥ // NCit_1.93 //
XXnagcitpu:194: himālayo yathā śreṣṭho nageṣu sakaleṣu ca /
XXnagcitpu:195: gaṅgā nadiṣu śreṣṭhaiva graheṣu somabhāskarau // NCit_1.94 //
XXnagcitpu:197: tathā śreṣṭhaṃ bhaveccitraṃ sarvāsu hi kalāsu ca // NCit_1.95 //
XXnagcitpu:198: nagnajid gaccha tasmāt tvaṃ viśvakarma samīpataḥ /
XXnagcitpu:199: lakṣaṇavidhimānaṃ ca tubhyaṃ sa upadekṣyati // NCit_1.96 //
XXnagcitpu:201: viśvakarmasamīpe tu prasanno hyagamad drutam // NCit_1.97 //
XXnagcitpu:203: ātithyaṃ vidhivat kṛtvā rājñe so 'dadadāsanam // NCit_1.98 //
XXnagcitpu:205: citrasya lakṣaṇaṃ karma upadiśatu me prabho // NCit_1.99 //
XXnagcitpu:206: vidhirvā parimāṇaṃ vā kīdṛśaṃ vā bhavettathā /
XXnagcitpu:209: citraśilpasya śāstraṃ tu tasmai rājñe hyupādiśat // NCit_1.101 //
XXnagcitpu:213: nirdiṣṭaṃ citralakṣaṇaṃ buddhimantaḥ kṛte śṛṇu // NCit_1.103 //
XXnagcitpu:217: brahmaṇaḥ kṛpayā labdhāḥ sarve śilpā mayā kṛtāḥ // NCit_1.105 //
XXnagcitpu:227: likhitvā vividhaṃ samyak tubhyaṃ mayā pradaśryate // NCit_1.109 //
XXnagcitpu:228: || iti nagnajiccitralakṣaṇanirdeśe nagnajayo nāma prathamaḥ parivarttaḥ ||
XXnagcitpu:229: dvitīyaḥ parivarttaḥ yathoktaṃ brahmaṇā pūrvam ācaṣṭe bhūpatiṃ tathā /
XXnagcitpu:231: sthāvare jaṃgame naṣṭe pralayānte ca vai purā /
XXnagcitpu:232: prādurabhūt suvarṇāṇḍaṃ tamo hatvā jalāt kila // NCit_2.2 //
XXnagcitpu:236: āyuṣā sahitasyaiva brahmaṇo jātireva ca // NCit_2.4 //
XXnagcitpu:237: sthānaṃ caryā ca dharmaśca nyāyaśca prābhavan tadā /
XXnagcitpu:238: evaṃ kṛte sati brahmā-cintayat jagato hitam // NCit_2.5 //
XXnagcitpu:241: apramādena cādaraḥ sadā teṣu kathaṃ bhavet // NCit_2.6 //
XXnagcitpu:242: brahmetthaṃ cintayitvā tu viṣṇoḥ śivasya cātmanaḥ /
XXnagcitpu:243: śakrasya sarvadevānāṃ parimāṇaṃ guṇaṃ tathā // NCit_2.7 //
XXnagcitpu:245: manoramaṃ surupaṃ ca atyantasradṛśaṃ tathā // NCit_2.8 //
XXnagcitpu:247: miśritena ca varṇena citrākāraṃ vinirmame // NCit_2.9 //
XXnagcitpu:249: sādhu sādhviti saṃpūjya praśaṃśasurvidhiṃ surāḥ // NCit_2.10 //
XXnagcitpu:250: ime devāḥ prasannāśca svaptākāraṃ ca lebhire /
XXnagcitpu:251: adhiṣṭhānaṃ prabhāvaṃ ca kṛtavantastathā ime // NCit_2.11 //
XXnagcitpu:252: prāha saptasurān brahmā astu puṇyaṃ samāśritam /
XXnagcitpu:253: adya prabhṛti sarvatra yuṣmākaṃ pratimāsu ca /
XXnagcitpu:254: nātra śaṅkā kṛthā naraḥ pūjayiṣyati vaḥ sadā // NCit_2.12 //
XXnagcitpu:256: manuṣyeṣu ca yo nāma bhavantaṃ pūjayiṣyati /
XXnagcitpu:257: tasmai kāmasya siddhaye nairujyaṃ saṃpradāsyati // NCit_2.13 //
XXnagcitpu:259: sarveṣā rakṣaṇa kṛtvā pāpān nāśayati dhruvam // NCit_2.14 //
XXnagcitpu:265: tayaiva dīyate śāntis tasmai bhaktāya sarvataḥ // NCit_2.17 //
XXnagcitpu:269: parimāṇādikaṃ teṣāṃ mattaḥ śrutvā ca lakṣaṇam /
XXnagcitpu:271: brahmaṇaśca mayā prāptaṃ vidyottamā ca lakṣaṇam /
XXnagcitpu:272: aśeṣaṃ parimāṇaṃ ca tubhyamadya pradīyate // NCit_2.20 //
XXnagcitpu:273: trilokeṣu ca pūjyānāṃ sarveṣāṃ dehināṃ tathā /
XXnagcitpu:278: tṛtīyaḥ parivarttaḥ lokasya kāyamānaṃ māṃ svayambhūrupadiṣṭavān /
XXnagcitpu:279: tat tathaiva pravakṣyāmi mānaṃ brūhi prajāsu ca // NCit_3.1 //
XXnagcitpu:282: ye bhavanti ca teṣāṃ vai bhūpatonāṃ tatastathā /
XXnagcitpu:288: aṣṭalikṣā bhaved yūkaḥ aṣṭayūkā yavaḥ smṛtaḥ // NCit_3.5 //
XXnagcitpu:299: sākṣāt savarṇyate cātra purvoktaṃ vistareṇa ca // NCit_3.10 //
XXnagcitpu:301: tribhāgena vibhaktaṃ ca samānena tathā budhaiḥ /
XXnagcitpu:309: dvātriṃśat tasya maṇdalam aṅgulīnāṃ hi mānataḥ // NCit_3.14 //
XXnagcitpu:312: karṇārandhrasya cāroha ekāṅgulo bhaved dhruvam // NCit_3.15 //
XXnagcitpu:316: bhruvorucchrāya āroho dvau yavau caturaṃguliḥ // NCit_3.17 //
XXnagcitpu:318: narttane rodane krodhe cāpākārā bhavet sadā // NCit_3.18 //
XXnagcitpu:319: bhaye śoke ca bhrūprāntāv unnatau kramikau smṛtau /
XXnagcitpu:322: bhrūmadhyāt keśaparyantaṃ mānaṃ dvyardhāṅgulaṃ matam // NCit_3.20 //
XXnagcitpu:324: dvyaṅgulau hyakṣikoṣaḥ syān netramadhyaṃ tathaiva tu // NCit_3.21 //
XXnagcitpu:328: yad bhavettasya mānaṃ syād yavatrayapramāṇakam // NCit_3.23 //
XXnagcitpu:335: kāmināṃ ca tathā strīṇāṃ netraṃ matsyodaraṃ bhavet /
XXnagcitpu:340: dīrghāgrasundaraṃ pakṣma śuvarṇaṃ saralaṃ mṛdu // NCit_3.29 //
XXnagcitpu:342: rājannetat vijānīyād yathā syāt netralakṣaṇam // NCit_3.30 //
XXnagcitpu:345: vilikhayet tathā dhīmān citraśāstreṣu dīkṣitaḥ // NCit_3.31 //
XXnagcitpu:354: ārohaḥ ṣaḍyavastasya oṣṭha ekāṅguliḥ smṛtaḥ // NCit_3.35 //
XXnagcitpu:366: pañcāṅgulaṃ tu gaṇḍodhvaṃ adhaḥ syāt caturaṅgulam /
XXnagcitpu:367: civukasya tathā mānaṃ caturaṅgulakaṃ matam // NCit_3.41 //
XXnagcitpu:369: caturasraṃ mukhaṃ pūrṇaṃ prasannaṃ cārulakṣaṇam // NCit_3.42 //
XXnagcitpu:370: trikoṇā kuṭilā vṛttā naiva kāryā mukhākṛtiḥ /
XXnagcitpu:371: krodhayuk roṣayuk caiva na mukhaṃ syāt kadācana // NCit_3.43 //
XXnagcitpu:373: susampanno bhaviṣyati nara iha ca sarvadā // NCit_3.44 //
XXnagcitpu:374: śāntikāmi mukhaṃ yat syād dīrghaṃ khartaṃ ca vartulam /
XXnagcitpu:375: trikoṇaṃ vā prajānāñca sāmānyānāṃ bhaviṣyati // NCit_3.45 //
XXnagcitpu:377: tad vijñeyaṃ ca devānāṃ mukhasya mānamīdṛśam // NCit_3.46 //
XXnagcitpu:379: avikṣiptena gṛhyatāṃ manasā ca mahipate // NCit_3.47 //
XXnagcitpu:381: jñeyaṃ tad dvyaṅgulaṃ nūnaṃ skandhāyāmaḥ ṣaḍaṅgulaḥ /
XXnagcitpu:382: daighrye tvaṣṭāṅgulo jñeyo vakṣastu dviguṇaṃ smṛtam // NCit_3.48 //
XXnagcitpu:384: aṣṭādaśāṅgulā śroṇī ārohe kathitā budhaiḥ // NCit_3.49 //
XXnagcitpu:385: jatruto hṛdayaṃ yāvan na kuṭilaḥ pradeśakaḥ /
XXnagcitpu:387: nābhito meṭraparyantaṃ samānaṃ ca bhaved dhruvam // NCit_3.50 //
XXnagcitpu:389: mānaṃ ca dahiṇāvarttaṃ yavaikaṃ cucukaṃ smṛtam // NCit_3.51 //
XXnagcitpu:402: tathaiva madhyadeśī hi āroheṇa ṣaḍaṅguliḥ // NCit_3.56 //
XXnagcitpu:407: mṛdu karikarākāraṃ na kāryaṃ viṣamaṃ kvacit // NCit_3.58 //
XXnagcitpu:409: jaṅghāyāḥ paścimo bhāgaḥ suvṛtto 'lponnatau bhavet // NCit_3.59 //
XXnagcitpu:410: ucchrāyeṇa tu pārṣṇīnāṃ mānaṃ pañcāṅgulaṃ matam /
XXnagcitpu:415: pādasya bandhanaṃ syāttu dvyuṅgulaṃ bhūpadeśagam // NCit_3.62 //
XXnagcitpu:424: aṅguṣṭhāpekṣayā sthūlā ārohe tryaṅgulā matāḥ // NCit_3.66 //
XXnagcitpu:432: avraṇā mṛdavaḥ pūrṇāḥ yavamānena pūritāḥ // NCit_3.70 //
XXnagcitpu:437: itthaṃ caraṇamānaṃ syān mayā proktaṃ sucintitam // NCit_3.72 //
XXnagcitpu:439: talaṃ saptāṅgulaṃ dīrghaṃ vistāraḥ pañcakāṅguliḥ // NCit_3.73 //
XXnagcitpu:441: tarjanyā nyūnatā bodhyā parvārdhena susaṃmatā // NCit_3.74 //
XXnagcitpu:445: aṅguṣṭhe dve tu parvaṇī samenaika yavo bhavet // NCit_3.76 //
XXnagcitpu:448: āyāmo 'ṣṭayavaḥ kārya ārohastu yavā nava // NCit_3.77 //
XXnagcitpu:455: parvārdhena mitāḥ kāryā nakhāḥ sūkṣmāṃ nakhāgrakāḥ /
XXnagcitpu:456: sṛṣyante ca yavādṛśaḥ parvatarekhā tvadoṣabhāk // NCit_3.81 //
XXnagcitpu:457: parvaṃ dīrghaṃ ca vṛtaṃ ca karatalasuśobhanam /
XXnagcitpu:458: talau padmasamau raktau karasyaivaṃ vidhānataḥ // NCit_3.82 //
XXnagcitpu:460: rekhātrayaṃ kare proktaṃ raktavarṇaṃ suśobhanam // NCit_3.83 //
XXnagcitpu:463: sukhadaṃ cāru susparśaṃ kuryāt karatalaṃ śubham // NCit_3.84 //
XXnagcitpu:464: samantān māṃsapūrṇaṃ vai nāṛī dṛśyā kadāpi na /
XXnagcitpu:465: hastapṛṣṭhaṃ sadā snigdham unnataṃ ca bhaved dhruvam /
XXnagcitpu:466: sūkṣmā aṅgulijālā hi sundaraṃ ca tanustathā // NCit_3.85 //
XXnagcitpu:470: bāhūnāṃ mānamārohaṃ dhīman śṛṇu vadāni te // NCit_3.87 //
XXnagcitpu:471: ubhayostu tathā bāhvīr mānaṃ kuryād yathāvidhi /
XXnagcitpu:473: aṣṭādaśa prabāhośca bāhoścāpi tathaiva ca // NCit_3.88 //
XXnagcitpu:475: āyāmo bāhubhāgasya jñeyaṃ pañcāṅgulaṃ sadā // NCit_3.89 //
XXnagcitpu:477: viśālo varttulākāraḥ suspaṣṭoraṃśo bhavet punaḥ // NCit_3.90 //
XXnagcitpu:480: hastau na jānuparyantau dīrdhau sūkṣrmau ca sundarau /
XXnagcitpu:487: yāni purvaṃ na coktāni tāni tubhyaṃ vadāmyaham // NCit_3.95 //
XXnagcitpu:492: āyāme cāṅgulīnāṃ hī saṃkhyā yāyād navānvitā // NCit_3.97 //
XXnagcitpu:494: pṛṣṭhamadhyaḥ ṣaḍaṅgulir urdhve tu viṃśatirmatā // NCit_3.98 //
XXnagcitpu:496: puruṣāṇāmidaṃ mānaṃ strīṇāṃ bhāgaḥ sa eva hi /
XXnagcitpu:501: caturaṅgulaṃ sthānaṃ syāt pāyustu dvyuṅgulaṃ matam // NCit_3.101 //
XXnagcitpu:509: varṇasya lakṣaṇaṃ caiva devamukhe na dīyate // NCit_3.104 //
XXnagcitpu:511: dadhimuktābjavacchuklāḥ svacchāḥ śvetā himā iva // NCit_3.105 //
XXnagcitpu:513: ārohe triyavā jñeyā āyāme yavayugmakāḥ // NCit_3.106 //
XXnagcitpu:514: dantamūlaṃ tathā tālu jihvāsīmā ca lohitam /
XXnagcitpu:520: navārdhaparṇavaccāruḥ mukhe vai vitato bhavet // NCit_3.109 //
XXnagcitpu:522: megharavasya gambhīrā vāṇī proktā sulakṣaṇā // NCit_3.110 //
XXnagcitpu:530: jaṅghāsu kaṇṭhagaṇḍeṣu keśā na syurmahātmanām // NCit_3.114 //
XXnagcitpu:533: vakṣasthalaṃ nṛpāṇāṃ ca śobhitaṃ syāt sulakṣaṇam // NCit_3.115 //
XXnagcitpu:534: devabhūtamanuṣyāṇāṃ mukhe śmaśru na roma ca // NCit_3.116 //
XXnagcitpu:542: uttamaḥ puruṣo jñeyaḥ lakṣmaṇaṃ cakravarttinaḥ // NCit_3.120 //
XXnagcitpu:547: veśadṛśāṃ gatiṃ cātha atikramya ca sarveṣām /
XXnagcitpu:549: gatirasya bhavedrājan sarveṣāṃ ca manoramā // NCit_3.123 //
XXnagcitpu:553: samantāt kiraṇāvṛtaḥ rājā lekhyaḥ kṛśaḥ sadā // NCit_3.125 //
XXnagcitpu:555: śarīraṃ yasya rājendra lakṣaṇaṃ cakravarttinaḥ // NCit_3.126 //
XXnagcitpu:558: bhrūvoḥ kaṇṭhasya bhālasya saundaryaṃ hi mukhasya ca // NCit_3.127 //
XXnagcitpu:560: cārvoṣṭaṃ raktimāpūrṇaṃ svacchā dantā nabho yathā // NCit_3.128 //
XXnagcitpu:561: dīrdhottama ca pakṣma hi snigdhavarṇaṃ bhavettathā /
XXnagcitpu:562: nīlaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ ca dīrghaṃ ca cakṣuḥ syāt sumanoharam /
XXnagcitpu:563: bhrūvau dīptau sadā jñeyau netrānandavidhāyakau // NCit_3.129 //
XXnagcitpu:571: dakṣiṇāvartino nābhiḥ gabhīrā syād yathāyatham // NCit_3.133 //
XXnagcitpu:573: samantāt maṇḍalākāraḥ ābhādṛśyā bhaved dhruvam // NCit_3.134 //
XXnagcitpu:575: mukheṣu connatā jñeyā gulpho 'dṛśpo bhavet tathā // NCit_3.135 //
XXnagcitpu:578: pādapṛṣṭomṛdū syātāṃ komalau haritau smṛtau // NCit_3.136 //
XXnagcitpu:584: tejasvī vīryavān rājan cakravarttī sadā bhavet /
XXnagcitpu:586: dehe jaṅghopajaṅghā ca bhṛśaṃ vikaśitā bhavet /
XXnagcitpu:587: suhastau caraṇau syātāṃ tathā parva ca dṛśyate // NCit_3.140 //
XXnagcitpu:589: śobhitau ca bhujau syātāṃ deho mānānvito bhavet // NCit_3.141 //
XXnagcitpu:592: cārudeho mahīpateḥ cakravartī sa ucyate // NCit_3.142 //
XXnagcitpu:595: upayukteṣu sarveṣu parimāṇaṃ tu yatra ca /
XXnagcitpu:596: tatra svāṅgulinā kāryaṃ mānaṃ sarvatra karmaṇi // NCit_3.144 //
XXnagcitpu:598: vidhinā parimāṇena sammpannaṃ śobhitaṃ bhavet // NCit_3.145 //
XXnagcitpu:601: pratimā sā parityaktā suradevaiḥ sadā khalu // NCit_3.146 //
XXnagcitpu:602: piśācā rākṣasā bhūtā vasanti tvarita tathā /
XXnagcitpu:603: śobhitān nāśayanti ca amaṅgalaṃ bhayaṃ bhavet // NCit_3.147 //
XXnagcitpu:605: yathecchaṃ vai vibhaktavyaṃ caturbhāgena mukhyataḥ // NCit_3.148 //
XXnagcitpu:610: apriyo na yathā yāyāt tathā mānaṃ vicārayet /
XXnagcitpu:611: kiṃ bhavet parimāṇena śarīraṃ cedasundaram // NCit_3.151 //
XXnagcitpu:612: caturṇāṃ ca tathā rājñāṃ parimāṇasya lakṣaṇam /
XXnagcitpu:613: brahmaṇā tu pradarśitaṃ vistaraṃ bravīmi te // NCit_3.152 //
XXnagcitpu:614: sarvasya lekhane granthe vistāro bhavati dhruvam /
XXnagcitpu:615: tena trasyanti cālpajñā aśrutikāraṇān nanu // NCit_3.153 //
XXnagcitpu:619: tubhyaṃ pradarśayāmi ced gacched grantho viśālatām // NCit_3.155 //
XXnagcitpu:622: uttamapuruṣādīnāṃ tena mānaṃ dhruvaṃ bhavet // NCit_3.156 //
XXnagcitpu:623: ato buddhayā suniścitya bhadro lekhyo vicārayan /
XXnagcitpu:624: sa ca bhavet samucchrāye ṣaḍuttaraśatāṅgulam // NCit_3.157 //
XXnagcitpu:632: ucchrāyo navarat strīṇā jñeya ekāṅguliḥ kṛśaḥ /
XXnagcitpu:636: āroho nāpriyo yāyāt tathā mānaṃ vidhīyatām // NCit_3.162 //
XXnagcitpu:639: nārīṇāṃ parimāṇaṃ ca sarvaṃ śṛṇu krameṇa hi // NCit_3.163 //
XXnagcitpu:640: rājñāṃ yathā pradarśitaṃ mānena ca tathāyutam /
